description: Permutation of N: for each k >= 1, let p(k)=least natural number not already an a(i), q(k)=p(k)+k, a(2k-1)=q(k), a(2k)=p(k).
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
crossrefs: Odd-indexed terms: A001950 (Upper Wythoff sequence). Even-indexed terms: A000201 (Lower Wythoff sequence). Inverse permutation: A064786.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
